original_text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?
korean_text: 예수께서 그들이 그 사람을 쫓아냈다 하는 말을 들으셨더니 그를 만나사 이르시되 네가 인자를 믿느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 그를 내쫓았다는 소식을 들으셨다

sentences.original_text: and when he had found him
Dost thou believe on the Son of God?
